gutter.description: Col gutter, default is horizontal spacing. Can be set to [Vertical, Horizontal](Support length unit)
gutter.description_zh: Col gutter，默认为水平间距。可设置为[垂直、水平]（支撑长度单位）

justify.description: Spindle alignment, optional value is flex-start flex-end center space-between space-around
justify.description_zh: 主轴对准，可选值为柔性启动柔性端中心间距-间距-周围空间

align.description: Cross axis alignment, optional value is flex-start flex-end center
align.description_zh: 十字轴对齐，可选值为柔性启动柔性端中心
